transcript:
Customer: Good morning sir, kaise ho sir?
Executive: Good morning, badhiya ji aap batao.
Customer: Ji ji. Accha mai ye keh raha tha ki wo jo concern hai usko mai close kar du na sir?
Executive: Ha close kar do sir isiliye aapne bola call confirmation chahiye to meeting me mera thoda time hai to maine kaha call kar leta hu aapko.
Customer: Accha accha thik hai sir thank you. Thik hai mai usko jo hai na sir close kar deta hu aapke paas jo hai na ek ek feedback ka mail jayega aapne jo bhi concern raise kiya tha usko maine solution provide kiya hai fir uske regarding.
Customer: Mujhe ek jankari aur chahiye dijiye.
Executive: Ji. Hello. Mujhe ek jankari aur dijiye jaise ki aap log na just dial ya google pe review collect karte hai to unko link bhejte hai waha se wo review kar sakte hai na?
Executive: Ek second sir ek minute aapki aawaz samajh me nahi aa rahi hai. Line pe rahiye sir please. Ha aap boliye sir please kya bol rahe the?
Customer: Hmm jaise ki google business pe just dial pe hota hai na ki agar mujhe review collect karne hai to mai unko link bhejta hu.
Customer: To client hame review kar deta hai. To aisa IndiaMART me provision hai kya?
Executive: Ha hai IndiaMART me hai provision aap lead manager open kijiye.
Customer: Kaha se wo link bhej sakta hu?
Executive: Ha mai aapko guide kar deta hu. Jaise lead manager aap open karenge IndiaMART me lead manager hoga sir.
Customer: Ha lead manager open kariye.
Executive: Ek minute aap line pe rahiye sir mai aapko guide kar deta hu. Perfect sir.
Executive: Mai bhi apna ek baar account open kar leta hu so that mai aapko easily bata du.
Executive: Ek second just aapko bata deta hu.
Executive: Line pe rahiye.
Executive: System thoda slow hai sir just mai open kar raha hu.
Executive: Waha pe dekhiye jab aap lead manager me koi bhi ek click kijiye koi bhi buyer ko waha pe dikh raha hoga multiple buyer ka left side me all contacts ke niche.
Customer: Ji. Ha thik hai dikh raha hai.
Executive: Waha pe dekhiye uske jaise hi aap uske kisi ek pe click kijiye.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ab dekhiye left side me jo hai na matlab right side me sabse top pe jo hai na ek call ka button bana hoga waha pe view more ka option hoga sir.
Customer: Ha hai.
Executive: Usko click kijiye view more ko.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Ab waha pe dekhiye aapko ask for review dikh raha hai?
Customer: Ask for review. Ha ha thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai iske through aap jo hai so kisi bhi jo bhi customer se aapko review lena hai aap ja sakte hai.
Customer: Ha thik hai wo to mai link bhej diya dusra option hota hai ki client direct jata hai ki wo mujhe review kare to wo kaise kar sakta hai?
Executive: Sir direct actually kya hota hai ki direct ke liye jo buyer aapse deal convert karta hai to uske paas mail jati hai uske through wo direct kar sakta hai sir.
Customer: Accha.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Baki aap ye number save kar lijiye mera personal number bhi aapke paas hoga 99 wala ye bhi number hai whatsapp pe bhi hai thik hai sir koi bhi problem hai to aap mujhe call kar lijiye.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ha please sir please. Okay. Thank you so much sir have a nice day thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wanted to know how to collect reviews.

- Wants to know if clients can review directly.



Resolution:

- Executive guided how to collect reviews.

- Informed about direct review process.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- review, lead manager, google business, justdial
